snippet: The owners of the Montauk Panoramic View Resort and Residences are accused of fraudulently using nearly $100 million from investors to repay loans.
abstract: Brian R Callahan and Adam J Manson, owners of the Panoramic View Resort and Residences in Montauk, NY, are indicted in federal court on charges of securities and wire fraud, using money from several investment funds that they ran to pay down debt on the resort; both men plead not guilty, and are released on secured bond.
lead_paragraph: The owners of the Montauk Panoramic View Resort and Residences are accused of fraudulently using nearly $100 million from investors to repay loans.
